name: Solos and Pairs
description:
The Kingdom of Amity is in trouble, and only a group of adventurers like yourselves can save it! Fight enemies as pairs to save the day, and maybe make some friends along the way :)

CONTROLS

Keyboard: X (Confirm) C (Back) Enter (Menu)

Gamepad: Right face (Confirm) Bottom face (Back) Start (Menu)

F4 for fullscreen
